How It Works

  1. 1. Install Pterodactyl Panel on your server.
  2. 2. Install the ShadowlessDash from GitHub or fork it.
  3. 3. Go through the setup.
  4. 4. Configure your settings, eggs, and invite your users!
  5. 5. Enjoy your freemium version of shadowless dash

Installation Guide

  1. 1. Requirements: Node.js, npm, and a running Pterodactyl Panel.
  2. 2. Download: git clone https://github.com/XaloraLabs/ShadowlessDash.git
  3. 3. Install Dependencies: cd ShadowlessDash && npm install
  4. 4. Configure: Configure the settings.json
  5. 5. Run: node index.js

See the full documentation for advanced configuration and troubleshooting.
